fr.gouv.finances.cp.utils.xml.marshal

Class XmlAttributes

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.gouv.finances.cp.utils.xml.marshal.XmlAttributes

  • public class XmlAttributes
extends java.lang.Object
    This class wraps a org.xml.sax.Attributes object and defines helper methods;

    License : LGPL

      Construct an XmlAttributes based on this attrs attributes.
